scripts.db:init: node --input-type=module -e "import {seedDatabase} from './src/lib/seed.js'; import fs from 'fs'; const dataDir = './data'; if (!fs.existsSync(dataDir)) fs.mkdirSync(dataDir, {recursive: true}); seedDatabase();"
